mods.abstract: NOTICE. COMMITTED to Jail at Marksville, a runaway negro man, who says his name is GEORGE and says belongs to JOS. MAY of Big Cane St. Landry. Said boy is about 59 years of age and is 5 feet 7 inches high. The owner is notified to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away or he will be dealt with accordnig to law. DORA GUILLOT, Mar. 7. Jailor.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
